attributes.action: For The Creation Of Post Graduate Student Loans
attributes.additional_details:
We call for the government to create post graduate loans (after degree) for students. After the government raised the fee's it is impossible for working class students to afford to pay £9,000 for a master degree upfront. Resulting in education being for the wealthy and not for the deserving.

Currently a student can only gain funding through a career development loan through a bank. However this causes problems as it is hard for a full time student to pay back their loan while studying full time for their masters. Instead we call for a loan system like the current undergraduate system in which students pay back their loan once they are earning without interest.

Make education fair, not for a price.
